{{title}} {{adaptation}} {{infobox character | people=[[Sindar|Sinda]] | name=Mell | image=Mell - The Lord of the Rings Gollum.png | caption="Mell" in the ''[[:Category:Images from The Lord of the Rings: Gollum|Gollum Game]]'' | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=Cellars of the [[Elvenking's Halls]] | affiliation=[[Elves of Mirkwood]] | language=[[Sindarin]] and [[Westron]] | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse= | children= | gender=Female | height= | hair=Light brown | eyes=Pale | clothing="''Simple and easy to wear''" | weapons= | steed= }} {{Quote|Will the King see me today?|''[[The Lord of the Rings: Gollum]]''}} '''Mell''' is a blind [[Sindar|Sinda]] [[Elves of Mirkwood|Elf]] confined to the cellars of the [[Elvenking's Halls]]. Mell was invented by [[Daedalic Entertainment]] for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Gollum]]'', where she is portrayed by Jessica Ellerby.{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://twitter.com/GollumGame/status/1641817777865408512|articlename=Will the King see me today?|dated=31 March 2023|website=Twitter|accessed=}} '''Mell''' was one of [[Gwendil]]'s followers, and is the only follower to have survived a trip into [[Mirkwood]]. == History == {{Blockquote|A Sindar Elf confined in the cellars of Thranduil's halls. Mell was blinded years ago, she now lives in guilt and solitude. She has a strong affinity with water and can use it to communicate with others if she so desires. Her pale skin, ragged look and lack of social skills highlight the isolation she has endured for so long.

Due to her living conditions and blindness, Mell lacks a lot of the grace that the other Elves have. Her clothing is simple and easy to wear to avoid complications when trying to dress herself.|''[[The Lord of the Rings: Gollum]]''}} == Etymology == ''[[Mell]]'' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "dear, beloved".{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://eldamo.org/content/words/word-1236042975.html|articlename=S. ''Mell'' adj.|website=[[Eldamo]]|accessed=}} {{references}} [[Category:The Lord of the Rings: Gollum characters]] [[Category:Elves from adaptations]]
